recipes.name: Salmon with honey
recipes.instructions: Pour a pinch of salt over salmon, take 1 tbs of pure honey and glace each piece, let it rest for 1 minute then cook for 10 min

recipes.name: pizza peperoni
recipes.instructions: Add lots of cheese and ingredients to dough

recipes.name: Sirloin
recipes.instructions: Sear and cook with garlic and butter

recipes.name: Fruit Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop a pineapple, papaya, watermelon and bananas, mix them good, glaze with some extra honey and and soursoup along the edges.
